title: The Battle of Salamis (Radio Edit)
description: Greg Jenner is joined by historian Prof Michael Scott and comedian Shappi Khorsandi in 480 BCE for one of history’s most notorious naval battles - The Battle of Salamis. On their journey through the events leading up to the battle and beyond, they hear about one of the most unusual methods used to cross a body of water and discover why sometimes it pays to give water a jolly good telling off.
itunes:subtitle: Greg Jenner and the team head all the way back to 480 BCE for The Battle of Salamis.
